Worklet.summary: The Worklet interface is a lightweight version of and gives developers access to low-level parts of the rendering pipeline.

remarks.para: With Worklets, you can run JavaScript and WebAssembly code to do graphics rendering or audio processing where high performance is required.

Worklets allow static import of ECMAScript modules, if supported, using import.
